task.title: Setting the port number of the plug-in server
task.shortdesc: System administrators can set the port number of the plug-in server by using the REST API POST method.

step.cmd: To set the port number of the plug-in server, use the REST API POST method.

substep.cmd: Provide PluginPort object configuration data in the payload of the POST method by using the following schema. Content-type is set to application/json. Ensure that capitalization and double quotation marks are used as shown.
substep.info:
{ "PluginPort": integer }Where:
PluginPort Specifies the port number of the plug-in server. Specify a value in the range 1 - 65535. The default value is 9103.
